Take #janebirkin for example. Universally lauded for her style. Carried a fucking straw basket. Wore the hell out of jeans & a t.
But fast fashion has made it so easy and accessible & kinda robbed the creativity & the thrill of the hunt for personal style
It's antiseptic, cold, capitalist, and exclusive. I prefer when fashion filters down a bit to the underground & "real" youth.
This is why I cherish my copy of #cheapchic https://t.co/9syl3HXQM5
